configureBleConnectionType(BleProfile) - Method in class com.bq.robotic.droid2ino.activities.BaseBluetoothConnectionActivity
Configure a future possible BLE connection to use a custom BleProfile.
configureBtSocketConnectionType(boolean) - Method in class com.bq.robotic.droid2ino.activities.BaseBluetoothConnectionActivity
Configure a future possible BT socket connection to be duplex or simplex.
connect(BluetoothDevice) - Method in class com.bq.robotic.droid2ino.communication.btsocket.BtSocketConnection
Start the ConnectThread to initiate a connection to a remote device.
connected(BluetoothSocket, BluetoothDevice) - Method in class com.bq.robotic.droid2ino.communication.btsocket.BtSocketConnection
Start the ConnectedThread to begin managing a Bluetooth connection
connectedDeviceName - Variable in class com.bq.robotic.droid2ino.activities.BaseBluetoothConnectionActivity
